EmailTemplate.name: Article Reprint Request
EmailTemplate.subject: Article Reprint Request
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Customer,
Thank you for contacting us.
If you would like to reprint some of the LegalZoom articles, please reply with the following information. We will provide you with the reprinting contract which you will need to sign and send back to us.
Your Name Title Your Company Name Company Address
Phone number
Email address
Name of the article or work that you would like to use
Author or other description of work, if known
How do you propose to use the work (choose one)
-- Electronic/Online only -- Print only -- Both Electronic/Online and Print
Where will the work appear (e.g. website URL or name of publication)?
Estimated start date of publication:
End date, if known
Type of right requested (choose one):
-- Post -- Reproduction and Distribution
Any additional comments.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom.
{!snippetVariable.ccsincerely}
{!snippetVariable.cclegalzoomline} {!snippetVariable.cc_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ccphone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
